amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Essential Air Service program by $150 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to reduce funding for the Essential Air Service program by $150 million and appily the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 280 (Roll no. 447).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 280 (Roll no. 447).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. McClintock.
